returns._0: true if in timeout, false if not

params.erc20Address: ERC20 contract address to be deposited

params.erc20Addresses: An array of ERC20 contract addresses

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.amount: amount of tokens to be withdrawn
params.erc20Address: address of the token to be withdrawn

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.erc20Address: ERC20 contract address to be withdrawn

checkIfWithdrawalTimeout().notice: checks if the Faucet is in a withdrawal timeout for the caller

deposit(address,uint256).notice: deposit tokens from caller to Faucet

getTokenBalances(address[]).notice: A function to get the Faucet's balances of multiple tokens at once

ownerWithdraw(address,uint256).notice: function that is only callable by owner and can withdraw as many tokens from this contract as they want

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: withdraw tokens from Faucet to caller
